content.detailedDescription: I seen a ufo on 73 three i was on my way back home from work and from out of no where i hear a big bang in the back of my truck then i see a beam of light so i took off going about 102 mph down the road and then it went away
content.summary: Big disc shape ufo

content.detailedDescription: I had my girlfriend snap this out of my jeep window. just thought i would share it with you.

I was just taking pictures of the view. i took several pictures. the object is only in this picture and i did not see object when i was taking the photo, only after i got home and looked did i see it.
content.summary: Nothing visible until after i looked at my cellphone pictures.

content.detailedDescription:
About 1:05 am june 3, 2010 severe thunder / lightning storm moving in from the northwest and i saw a single plane like bluish light moving through the very bad lightning and watched it wondering what the heck a plane was doing flying directly through the storm. 

the storm had to be at least 10 miles away and the light i first saw moving through it was behind it coming towards my direction, but it came on very fast. fast enough that before i realized it had gotten closer i could see something that at first appeared to be a triangular shape or diamond shaped outline against the approaching storm clouds. it looked like it stopped and i guess made a complete 90 degree turn and then flew right over my head. 

as it flew over i could distinctly see it was a rectangular shaped craft and see the lines of it's construction as well as markings underneath (couldn't quite make the markings out but they looked like something an aircraft would be marked with). in the center of it i could still make out the bluish light and could lightly see what looked like red squares in each corner and still faintly make out the square outline of the craft but if i hadn't been so curious about seeing a 'plane' flying through a bad lightning storm it pretty much completely blended in with the sky. doubt anyone else would be able to make it out unless they spotted it by chance and were watching.

it was fast and silent. couldn't estimate how high up it was since i am not sure what type of aircraft you could compare it to but judging by how high it was coming through the storm i'd have to say pretty big for me to see that much detail as it went overhead. bigger than any kind of aircraft i have ever seen.

when i realized i was looking at something strange i went to get my cell phone to take a picture or something but it was way gone. last heading towards the direction of galveston bay.

i'm sure it was military. confident of it. just had a familiar kind of 'feel' to it as it went overhead.

would love to know what it was though, and would like them to explain how they got that kind of technology in the first place.
content.summary: Certainly military experimental aircraft (but still want to know what it was)

content.detailedDescription: Was on my back patio looking out when i saw what looked like a very bright star,i know the sky and it wasnt venus or the north star,it was very bright did not move ,warbled a little became very dim almost completelt out ,then it would flare up again.Over the span of an hour or so it slowly moved out of view ina north west direction,the only thing it could have been is a helicopter but i grew up near  two major airports in nyc and this was not a helicopter light ,it eminated like a mini sun
content.summary: Noticed what looked like a very bright star in the western sky, however it became really bright , then dim didnt move at all.

content.detailedDescription:
As i was watching television at approximately 9:45 pm, i noticed what seemed like an extremely bright star in the sky out of the window (facing northwest). as i just kept an eye on it over a few minutes it remained stationary keeping with my thought that it was just a really bright star, but then i thought that was odd, since the sky was completely cloudy and i could not see any other stars. as i continued to watch it seemed at times to split into 2 lights and then merge back into one. the light then got really bright, then dimmed down to just a little pinpoint of light and then got really bright again for maybe a minute. then it quickly dimmed down and disappeared.  all of the lights were off in my house and we don't have any lights on the outside of the house besides the front porch light. the television was on, but it is on the same wall as the window that i was looking out, so it couldn't have been a reflection from the tv. i don't know why but i just kept thinking as i watched it was "i see you".
after it disappeared, i watched that part of the sky for bit, just to see if it was just a star that looked weird, but there was nothing there that i could see because of the clouds.
content.summary: Extremely bright stationary light that seemed to sometimes split into 2 objects.  light would get extremely bright then dim down.

content.detailedDescription:
I went out to a parking lot after my friends wedding and saw what appeared to be at airplane flying overhead at what looked like 1000+ ft. it appeared to be flying fairly slow. i heard no engine sound but that might be expected. the odd thing is that the light was unmistakably a fire. i could see the flickering or the flame. there were no other strobe/marker lights that would normally be on a plane. i pointed it out to a few others in the parking lot and no one had a viable explanation. i remember hearing about an incident similar to this where people called into a local police station and it turned out to be parachutists trailing something on fire. this object did not apear to be descending. it was making slight course changes though as if someone was piloting. i watched this object for about 5-7 minutes as it slowly got farther and farther away. just when i was about turn away a second object came over the trees at about the same altitute/position as the first. it seemed to follow the first object but with a mile or two separation. this second object was exactly like the first with a single light that appeared to be a fire. i am a private pilot and long time astronomer. i have seen some strange things in the sky before but nothing like this. i would love to know if there is any explanation or if anyone else spotted these objects  :)

~ z ~
content.summary: I saw two lights in the sky that appeared to be on fire and traveled like small airplanes.

content.detailedDescription:
Well my 21yr old son his girlfriend and i were in the swimming pool and he said look a ufo i looked up and said thats a baloon he said naw its a ufo i looked at it it was round and huge i said its shinning he said dad i wish i had my camrea and then i heard this loud noise from the north and it took off so fast it was gone and then 4 f16 fighter jet were heading in the same direction and my son and i were like wow!
it looked as if they were in pursuit of it.
thats it
also on the fourth of july my wife and i were out on the deck and we saw this huge light in the sky it just sat their and then it slowly faded out.
i dont know what it was i know it was not a plane.
content.summary: It was shinning

content.detailedDescription:
i had returned from going snowboarding and was retrieving gear from my car and taking it to my apartment.  i was walking toward my place and noticed something moving in the sky to my left.   i was facing east, the moon was rather full and bright, and the cloud cover was not heavy but rather light with lots of open sky.  
  upon seeing the movement,  i focused my view toward the object and tracked it as it moved through the sky.  it seemed to be moving at cloud level as it appeared to flash in and out of the clouds.  i assumed it was a plane but the speed of the object peaked my interest, i was just hoping to see what sort of jet this was.  as it moved toward the bright moon, it broke through into the luminescence and was illuminated.  
  i can only describe it as a bullet shape.  it left no contrail or other type of trail, it simply was moving through the sky.  i recall a sharpish point and a flat backside.  as it broke into the light of the moon, i recall being impressed by the size and look.  it just seemed sleek and shiny.   
  the object continued along heading south, it moved at a rate that was much too fast for any commercial plane.  i heard no engine sounds or anything. i watched as long as i could and it quickly moved out of my line of sight. 
  i remember immediately thinking that this was really odd but my first thought was sort of military craft.  it just seemed so different than any of the current designs that are utilized for flight by current technology, made my think that this was not a product of conventional design. 
  whoever or whatever it was, it was moving fast as heck and made no noise at all.
content.summary: Object racing across sky

content.detailedDescription:
The first time i noticed the lights was on 
march 29, 2010.  myself, my wife, and our 3 kids were star gazing in the backyard. i noticed this star that seemed to be shinning awfully bright.  we watched it through the telescope.  it did not move.  then more lights appeared around it.  they flash real bright, then dim out, then reappear, sometimes in a different spot, and sometimes appearing to move. it seemed odd to us, so we started watching for them.  my wife takes pictures each time we see them, to show what we are seeing and record the dates. we saw them again on april 12 and april 27.  then on may 5, 2010 we decided to drive in the direction we are seeing them.  i took the video camera and zoomed in as much as possible on one of the lights.  my wife took pictures of the surrounding lights.  we watched the video of the lights frame by frame and noticed that within the ball of light there seemed to be some sort of cylinder structure.  we were amazed at what we saw.  while searching the internet for other similar sightings, we came across mufon, and clifford clift.  i met with him and gave him a copy of my video. we saw the lights again about 2 more different times after we talked to cliff, no pictures or video these times. then on may 21 we had some friends over and they appeared again.  our friends are as amazed as we are.  our friend videoed some with my video camera.  then on may 31, 2010 we saw them again.  this night i caught some of the best video.  i zoomed in as much as possible and focused on one light.  next thing i know another light appears right next to it.  after reviewing the video, i noticed that the second light that appears actually flew in (very dim) from the left and stopped at the top right of the first light, then lights up as bright as the first.  both of these lights seem to have the same cylinder structure. i called clifford again to let him know of the video.  he had refered me to speak with cheryl gantz.  she asked me to report to mufon what we have been seeing.  then on june 2, 2010 we saw them again.  

each time that we see the lights, it seemes to be after 8:00p.  usually we notice 2-5 lights, lasting from about 15-45 minutes, then they just disappear.  they flash very colorful lights, starting off yellow/orange then red, blue, green, purple. they do not appear in the same area each time. and their actions are different each time, sometimes sitting still, blinking out, reappearing, sitting together, or moving apart.  at times they move very slow and other times possibly as fast as a plane, maybe faster.  i also notice that at times they seem to try to appear as a plane using the blue and red lights.  we truely all very excited for what we keep seeing!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looks like a bright flashing star.  zoom in on video looks like it has a cylinder structure.

content.detailedDescription: Shortly after 10 p.M. on wednesday night, may 27, my wife and i were putting the trash cans out to the street when we noticed an unusual large round large and bright whitish objcet hovering over capri pass off to the northwest of our house.  we got out our binoculars and watched it for about fifteen minutes.  we then called our neighbors on w. pago pago and asked them to go out and see if they could see what we were watching.  it was round and about 3 times the size of the moon.  it had colored lights that pulsed horizontally around it in horizontal lines.  it had white lights running up and down vertically, and also seemed to have white spheres jutting off it going up and down.  it was somewhat transparent too.  there appeared to be two objects at times that moved slightly apart and then close together.  there was no noise.  it did not resemble any kind of aircraft or derigible.  it dropped down lower for a short time, then moved sideways for a quick dart.  with the binoculars it seemed like you could see inside of it.  it finally backed up and disappeard at about 11:15 p.M.  we took a digital photo, but our camera was not strong enough to capture a clear image.  our neighbors on w. pago pago watched it with us for awhile.  we all saw the exact same thing as we comared discriptions while watching it through binoculars.
content.summary: While putting out trash on the night of may 27, 2010 shortly after 10 p.M. my wife and i noticed a large unusual ball of white light hovering over capri pass to the northwest of us.

content.detailedDescription:
I actually went out to look for ufo's after reading a tucson report the other day.  tonight just after sunset venus only star really visible...Low in the west.  a bright slow moving light on the eastern (and a bit south)  horizon (about 15-20 degrees above horizon) moved west and north - toward my location. it traveled slowly - i can'tsay how fast but it took about 5 minutes to travel the distance. it took several minutes to arrive alomost completely over my head. it was too slow and  high for a plane. and, planes don't stop overhead.  it seemed to "pick" a location overhead...As though settling in or something..Little wobbles of movement and then...Bam, it doesn;t move again and it tracks with the stars!  i tried to take video but it is too jumpy, best is i could pull stills and compare time stamp to location....Definately will get a better tripod and not bother zooming in - too far away...Just track it's motion..So hopefully. there is no realdefinition in the object but la bright light, it must be very high up.
by 8:35 it was stopped for a few minutes and totally seemed like a star. i was hoping others might watch the sky towards queen creek..Low around 8-20 till 8:30 pm and see if perhaps it is some kind of satellite... i left the camera on the whole time, so even though it is jumpy and hard to see travel i am pretty sure i didn't substitute a star for the moving object..As there were almost no other stars visible until a good 15 minutes after this began....   it was actually pretty weird and no one to see with me.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Only venus shining in west, bright star like object moves slow from se to overhead and stop and seems to be star.

content.detailedDescription: I live in austin, tx and i work downtown. it was friday night and i got off work at about 11:00pm. i hung out around work for a bit with friends and and headed home at about 11:30. i walked around to the back of the building and noticed a formation of 7-8 orange lights moving slowly, making no noise at all, to the southeast and low. they emerged from behind a skyscraper heading north, so i pulled out my camera and started filming. they crossed just overhead of a full moon, creating a beautiful shot. i got about 45 seconds of footage and stopped for a better angle. when i looked up again, they were gone. i only wish that i would've captured them vanishing.
content.summary: Blinking, orange lights in triangular formations

content.detailedDescription: 06/02/10 at about 9:30 a.M . i was stopped at a light on rt 441 off of 490 in brighton; i was facing east when i saw 2 perfectly round clouds.  the sky was blue and there were large billowing clouds which made the smaller round clouds really stand out in comparison. the 2 round clouds began to dissipate revealing 2 silver objects, saucer in shape and the size of jet fighters.  one suddenly shot towards the south in a bright flash of light, the other did the same but took off north. i'm not a pilot so i can't state distance but to me the objects were not that far away.
content.summary: 2 ufos in 2 very round clouds which dissipated revealing 2 discs; size of jet fighters

content.detailedDescription: On tue june 1st at 5:55 pm we saw a sphere in mid-air. silver on back silver on bottom clear on top with someone or something dark in it. it was in view lower then a air plain higher then the trees (it looked like a jetson air hovercar) it was going north west (no sound). we saw it for 5 min's then it just disappeared. it was not a balloon , air plain or bird. but it was weird
content.shape: Circle,   Disc,   Oval,   Saturn-like,   Sphere,   Other
content.summary: Sphere silver on back silver on bottom clear on top with someone or something dark in it.

content.detailedDescription: At 7:19pm i had just arrived home and happen to have my camera with me, a canon rebel t1i with an 18-55mm lens. i saw a beautiful sunset and decided to take some pictures. i was standing at the gateway entrance of my house when i started taking a few shots. i came inside my home and downloaded the pics to my laptop. i suddenly noticed that in one of my shots it reveals a dark, round shaped object within the clouds and a passanger airliner flying way below it. what's funny is that i originally bought this camera because at night i see many lights in the sky on different nights and i wanted a high power camera to catch them. i wasn't trying to take picture of a ufo but then again this is not the first time this has happen to me. it's like they want me to see them.
content.summary: Dark shaped object in clouds.

content.detailedDescription: At work at approximately 6am, may 27, 2010 a co-worker noticed a bright golden-like stationary object in the sky while looking out the 4th story east-facing window. there was not a single cloud in the sky. approximately 10-15 workers surrounded the window to see and try to understand what they were observing. after several minutes, the object could no longer be seen as the sun began to rise above the mountains. several witness agreed that it looked like a cross, or perhaps the silhouette of a person with arms extended outward. to date no one has come any logical explanation of what we all witnessed.
content.summary: Approx 6am witnessd by approx 10-15 people for at least 7-10 mins. out eastern window just before sunrise.  bright illuminating gold-like stationary object.

content.detailedDescription: I am a former air line employee with three air lines. i saw a huge craft while we were descending thru white clous cover . it was acorn shaped with a rotating band of yellowish white oval lights. it seem ed stationary. i was in seat a-3 first class. i have worked for three air lines at dulles internetional air port iad. it was broad daylight. it was 12:30-pm
content.summary: Flt#611 united out of dca reagan national landing ord chicago ohare

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on my back patio having a smoke and looking at the stars. noticed a very bright object coming from the ssw heading nne. i noticed it just over the tree tops near the horizon. it was realy moving !I thought it was lifeflight coming into the hospital nearby.It way faster than a jet or satellite. i know this due to the fact i watch them nightly. it was very high and made no noise(it was very quiet out)i went in the house to get my phone and call my cousin in abilene some 90 miles away. getting the phone ,calling and connecting took maybe 90 sec. by the time he answered and went outside said object was heading out of his sight nne.Post script: i see high aircraft/ satellites nightly and this was far far brighter and faster than any i have ever wittnessed. i have been a sky watcher for 30+ yrs and this was by no way a meteorite/plane/satellite .
content.summary: Very bright/ red light

content.detailedDescription: Several of my friends and i were camping near vail. stargazing, we observed a star that seemed to be moving strangly. we are all skeptics and tried our best to come up with an explanation as to what we were seeing. we all agreed, there was none. the object was very far away and appears to have green, red and white lights that would vary in intensities and directions. the object would dart randomly in all directions. the speed of the object and velocity which it quickly changed directions made us conclude that we were witnessing something very interesting. i've never seen a ufo and felt compelled to document my sighting. if anyone saw anything similar, please feel free to contact me. no pictures. my camera wouldn't pick up the lights against the night sky.
content.summary: Star like object w/erratic movements.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my car staring at the stars to the north east at about 45 degrees. there was a burst of about 5 rings of light for about a total of  1.5 to 2 seconds. the last one, that was larger,formed as if it was being drawn with a pencil and did not complete its circle. what i mean is didnt just appear. the colors of the burst were different as in  the normal color spectrum of light we see. the lights didnt just blink on and off they appeared to form and faid. i was startled and thinking what was that i just saw. then about 3 seconds later i noticed what i thought was a medium star. not really that bright, just what you would think is a normal star about 20 degrees to east of the burst moving at what had to be over 2000 miles per hour, horizontally and past my line of sight in about 4 seconds. i had to tell somebody what i saw because it was not a thing you see every day. but i sure would love to know what it was because it wasnt swamp gas and stars dont move sideways at that speed.
content.summary: Flash of light and moving star like object

content.detailedDescription: I had heard that an american spaceprobe would be returning to make a landing in florida.  i went outside to see the spaceprobe as it flew over los angeles to the south and towards florida.   as i watched, i saw a round white object of about the same size following the space probe and pacing it.  i was surprised and thought i would only be seeing the returning spaceprobe or space rocket in the dark sky.  the spaceprobe was very high so the second object might have not been an airplane.  in fact, the second white object looked very much like the returning spaceprobe as it paced the returning rocket or spaceprobe returning from space and orbiting the round earth.  the spaceprobe would then fly eastward from the los angeles sky area and to the return or home base at cape caneveral, florida.  as i recall, the date was probably early 2008.   the two objects then sped to the east and disappeared from view.  i was standing outside my home on the front lawn at around 8:00 pm during the year 2008.  los angeles, california.  when i heard about the returning spaceprobe, i went outside and stood on the grass and looking towards the south to see the returning spaceprobe announced in the los angeles times newspaper.  as i stood watching, i suddenly noticed at a distance a second white object following the returning american spaceprobe and moving at the same speed until the two disappeared and moving towards florida to the east direction.  the thought came to my mind later that perhaps the second 0bject was an airplane pacing the spaceprobe.  but the returning spaceprobe would have been very high in the atmosphere.  the entire incident was very puzzling and nothing was mentioned later in the los angeles times newspaper about the two objects.  i telephoned the griffith park observatory in los angeles, and they did not know what the second returning or pacing object was that i saw in the evening sky in early 2008.
content.summary: During return of american space probe, white object followed behind the proble at a disance in the dark sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking through woodland park during twilight on about july 4, 1947.  at the time, i was a 22-year-old student at the university of washington in seattle to the east of woodland park. the time was early twilight with a clear sky.  for some reason,  i happened to look up and saw a white bright oval object dropping down from the twilight atmosphere.  the object suddenly  made a very sharp 90-degree turn  to the horizontal and then sped at high speed south along puget sound until it disappeared to the south towards mount st. helens.    there was no sound, and the object had a round oval shape.   i was very surprised at seeing the white object in the twilight sky.   woodland park was on a high bluff overlooking puget sound with the olympic mountain range to the west.   this happened soon after the report by pilot kenneth arnold of his sighting of nine silvery "flying saucers" over mount rainier, washington, june 2q4, 1947.  i thought that perhaps this object was one of the nine flying saucers or ufos seen by kenneth arnold on june 24, 1947.   on nearby mount adams, washngton, at the same time of 3:00 pm on june 24, 1947,  prospector fred johnson said he also saw some of the same nine saucers seen by kenneth arnold over mount rainier. during this same time period,  other witnesses saw the ufos over seattle and frank ryman took a photo of a saucer over the seattle area on july 4, 1947.  the kenneth arnold june 24, 1947,  sighting is described in the 1952 book by kenneth arnold and raymond palmer, the coming of the saucers.  the book also described the nine flying saucers seen by united airlines pilots e.J. smith and ralph stevens and stewardess martie morrow while they were flying near boise, idaho,  july 4, 1947.  over the years, i puzzled over my seattle sighting on about july 4, 1947, and wondered if the bright white object could have been one of the nine flying saucers seen by pilot kenneth arnold and prospector fred johnson on june 24, 1947, and by smith and stevens and morrow on july 4, 1947.
content.summary: In woodland  park, i looked up and saw a bright object dropping down from the twilight sky..

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my computer looking up work related site when i felt suddenly energized & about 30 sec. later , just when a thought appeared that the ets might be close by , i've heard a black helicopter flying low & fast over my place , so i quickly ran to the window scanning the dark sky . less than a sec. later i saw in the sky a bright flush of light than darkness & than way far another flush , about 6-7 skips of light flushes across the sky !  it really did looked as it skipped in big leaps , just as one would take a flat pebble & throw it on the surface of water watching the rock bounce off .  they seemed extremely fast going & the direction was from north to south line .  horizon level approx. 50 * , although at the fifth skip-flush it seemed a tiny bit lower , but than it was too dark outside to be too sure .  i'm really glad that the helicopter actually flew in the northern direction as the ufo was already on the south , hah ! 
the whole viewing experience of the lights flushes was 6 or 7 sec. only .
content.summary: Black helicopter than flushes of ufo skipping through the night sky

content.detailedDescription: As i stepped out the house to smoke a cigarette, i looked up and a bright blue light flew across the sky in approximately 2 seconds at an incredible speed. it couldn't have been an airplane or firework or anything normal. left me speechless, didn't even bother mentioning it to my brother inside the house. i stood outside looking up and for the duration of my cigarette i didn't see anything else.
content.summary: Bright blue light flying extremely fast across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was visiting a friends home in pleasant grove, utah. we were just off main street around 300 south.(downtown) i don't really know the exact date.
i was outside on the front lawn talking to two friends. it was a beautiful clear night and we were looking at the stars and i noticed this shape. i tried to point it out to my friends but they could never find the shape. i looked away several times and was able to find it again fairly easily. both my friends had complained about their poor eyesight but i had been tested previously and found to have extremely good sight.  my first thought was that it was some type of aircraft. i don't know what it was so i will try to be factual from here on.

a triangular shape crossed the clear night sky to the east, toward and possibly over, mount timpanogos. it had no marking lights and no noise. it blocked out the stars behind it and was only visible because it was slightly lighter than the night sky. it moved at a constant and steady rate of speed and moved in a straight line from south to north until it finally faded from view.  now it is difficult to tell the distance of things at night and when they are dark also. my impression was that it was at a cruising altitude similar to that of an airliner. mount timpanogos reaches about 12,000 feet (over a mile high off the valley floor) and i would say this had to be quite a bit higher. now if this assumption is close to accurate i would say the size of this shape was maybe four times the size of an airliner at that same distance and was moving about three times faster, based on a casual comparison to the planes seen during the daytime.

after the object faded from view i made a few suggestions about what it could have been and noted that it had no marking lights. i mentioned that it was traveling in what i thought to be a commercial flight path and i wouldn't think the military would be doing exercises there. it was a curious and interesting side note to the evening.
content.summary: A triangular shape crossed the clear night sky with no marking lights and no noise. it blocked out the stars behind it and was only visible because it was slightly lighter than the night sky.

content.detailedDescription: I observed a bright star-like objcet in the sky the night of may 22nd 2010 while standing outside of my apt. building. i was told about this object the previous night around 9pm. i watched this object for about 30 minutes around 10:30pm 5/22/10. i witnessesd the object fade in and out a few times and eventually vanished from sight. the second event took place on the night of 6/1/10. this same ufo has been sighted numerous times in the same general area. the second time i witnessed the ufo navigate in my direction then change course and disappear out of sight. as the object changed positions i had to go up to the 3rd floor of my apt. building to follow it. when i came back downstairs the ufo was completely out of sight.
content.summary: Observed a bright star-like object 10-15miles away  fading in and out periodically.

content.detailedDescription: Another picture blown up of ufo we saw.
content.summary: Black triangle ufo.

content.detailedDescription: Driving my kids home from a school function friday afternoon approx. 3:30 pm.  driving on a side street going home i looked up and right above the trees i saw a black triangle shaped object kind of floating above the trees.  at first i thought it to be a kite or balloon but it was odd in movement and in shape, as i continued to drive the object was going in our direction.  i said what is that do you see that?? my kids were kind of freaked out by it.  at the corner of my street is a factory with a 4-5 story high chimney, this object went around the chimney and kinda started hovering by the tree line.  i had my camera with us for the school event and so i started snapping pictures.  it started to move away from where we were parked, so we got in the car and started chasing it.  we followed it down a street of industrial factories, and i pulled into a lot with a clear view of where this thing was "hovering" i got out the car and snapped a few more pics and tried to take video of it.  i called  a few of the workers over who were looking at me like i was crazy and wondering what i was doing there, until i showed them the object in the sky.  they were all looking at the object and wondering exactly what it was we were looking at fly slowly across the sky.  it stopped and seemed to be hovering over a shopping plaza, and i got my kids back in the car and tried to chase it down by time i got to the shopping plaza, (which is only a five minute drive from where we were at)  it was long gone.  very weird, my daughter and i both though we saw it slightly change shape and it was very odd. never ever saw anything like this before ever!!!
content.summary: Black solid small 3 d shaped triangle looked as if it changed from triangle to pyramid

content.detailedDescription: First silver object was straight up but slightly west, 30-40k ft altitude and stationary, then moed behind clouds.  further nw another object stationary then took off to nw, looked like it was tumbling and flashing; refleting light, not illuminating.  went behind clouds.  third object seen slightly to the north, eventually went into clouds.  then 5 objects appeard slightly to the northeast. much higher, perhaps 60-70k ft altitude.  they appeared to be dots of flashing light.  moved off to the north in a formation.  then a ninth object, which looked elongated, seemed to be falling straight down out of the sky, no tumbling motion.  went below the cloud cover and was south of the others.  all this over metro, downtown phoenix: 75th avenue and thomas road.  more than myself witnessed this.  i called dr. lynne kitei, the employer of my fiance.  she then called stacey wright and jim mann of phoenix mufon.  stacey called me back and i reported all the above to her, verbally.  i do not have a computer to report this to mufon, so i gave permission to stacey to document and report this sighting.  (i, stacey wright, am the typist here).
content.summary: 9 silver/flashing objects in sky above metro phoenix
